title: Ninjaman Ippei
synopsis: Way out in the sticks, the fourth-graders of the local school in Tokio village all have their own superpowers of doubtful merit, including flying eyeballs and missile-hair. Ippei and his friends study hard to be ninjas, but they are constantly under treat from the arrogant cheats from the neighbouring village of Techno.
staff: [['Takayashiki, Hideo', ['Director', ' Script']], ['Kaneko, Yutaka', ['Script']], ['Nanba, Hitoshi', ['Key Animation']], ['Saegusa, Shigeaki', ['Music']]]
